channel.title: PowerMad on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in PowerMad on TLDRBins

item.title: ADIDNS
item.description: General Linux Windows 1. DNS Dump # Password bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> get dnsDump # NTLM bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p ':<HASH>' -f rc4 --host <DC> get dnsDump # Kerberos bloodyAD -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -k --host <DC> get dnsDump 1. Import Module . .\Powermad.ps1 2. Enum # Get ADIDNS zone Get-ADIDNSZone # Get ADIDNS permissions Get-ADIDNSPermission # Remove a node Remove-ADIDNSNode -Node * Abuse #1: ADIDNS Poisoning Linux Windows 1.
